forecast-period.text: A low over the Tasman Sea will move away to the east today, as a high approaches from the west and extends a ridge over Tasmania. The high centre will slowly pass to the south of the state late on Sunday then move away to the southeast on Monday, directing an easterly flow over Tasmania.

Wind gusts can be 40 percent stronger than the averages given here, and maximum waves may be up to twice the height. Wind warnings are issued for today and tomorrow and describe the highest category of wind warning for that day.
For latest warnings go to www.bom.gov.au, subscribe to RSS feeds, call 1300-659-216* or listen for warnings on relevant TV and radio broadcasts.
* Calls to 1300 numbers cost around 27.5c incl. GST, higher from mobiles or public phones. Marine forecasts are also available on VHF and HF radio. View the radio schedule on www.bom.gov.au/marine
Check the latest Coastal Waters Forecasts for information on wind, wave and weather conditions for neighbouring coastal zones.

area.description: Lower East Coast: Wineglass Bay to Tasman Island

forecast-period.warning-summary: Strong Wind Warning for Saturday for Lower East Coast
forecast-period.text: Winds: South to southwesterly 20 to 30 knots decreasing to 15 to 25 knots in the evening. Seas: 2 to 3 metres, decreasing to 1.5 to 2 metres by early evening. Swell: South to southwesterly 2 to 3 metres. Swell: Northeasterly around 1 metre. Weather: Cloudy. 80% chance of showers.

Winds: Southerly 15 to 20 knots decreasing to about 10 knots in the evening. Seas: 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing to 1 metre during the morning. Swell: South to southwesterly 2 to 3 metres. Swell: Northeast to southeasterly around 1 metre, tending south to southeasterly 1 to 1.5 metres during the morning. Weather: Cloudy. 50% chance of showers.

Winds: South to southeasterly about 10 knots becoming easterly during the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: Southwesterly 1.5 to 2.5 metres. Swell: Southeasterly 1 to 1.5 metres, decreasing to around 1 metre during the morning. Weather: Cloudy. 40% chance of showers.
